price: Isaan waan mu'imintootatti hojjatan irratti hirmaattota.
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
